title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 911/93 of 19 April 1993 determining the effects in the milk sector of abolishing the accession compensatory amounts and the supplementary trade mechanism in trade between Portugal and the other Member States of the Community
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 911/93 of 19 April 1993 determining the effects in the milk sector of abolishing the accession compensatory amounts and the supplementary trade mechanism in trade between Portugal and the other Member States of the  Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Regulation (EEC) No 3812/90 shall no longer apply.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 April 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 April 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
